Roller skates with built-in speakers that allow users to listen to music while they skate.
Roller skates with adjustable heights for people of different ages and heights.
Roller skates with built-in LED lights that illuminate the skates and the surrounding area, making them perfect for night skating.
Roller skates with a self-cleaning mechanism that automatically removes dirt and debris from the skates.
Roller skates with a built-in-in system that allows users to connect their smartphones and control music, calls, and messages while they skate.
